title: The Radius
posting_body: ['Located in Southfield, Michigan, Radius at Ten Mile is a beautiful community that you would be proud to call home.', 'Our exceptional apartments and impressive community amenities paired with our gracious team will surpass all of your expectations.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Quartz Kitchen Countertops', 'Pet Friendly', 'Prime Location', 'Full Size Gas Stackable Washer/Dryer in Apartments', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Clubhouse', 'Pantry Closet', 'Hotel Style Card Access Security Lock at Apartment Entry', 'Online Resident Portal', 'Spacious 1 BR, 2BR & 2 BR-plus Loft Apartments 1-2 ½ Baths', 'Wood Style Flooring', 'Spacious 9’ Ceilings with Open Concept Floorplans', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
